tool_description: Get publicly accessible information from trademe.co.nz using our Scraper API. Get Information such as search results, product information and sellers' listings.
name: trademe
title: trademe

api_list.name: Search By Keywrod
api_list.description: Get Search Results using Keyword and Filters.

optional_parameters.name: sort
optional_parameters.description:
Options: 

- featured
- lowToHigh
- highToLow
- lowestBuyNow
- highestBuyNow
- mostBids
- mostRecent
- closingSoon
- discount

api_list.name: Search By URL
api_list.description:
Get Search Results using URL.
Use this endpoint when you need highly custom search filters.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
Search Results URL.
Use this endpoint when you need highly custom search filters.

api_list.name: Get Seller Listings

required_parameters.name: memberID
required_parameters.description: Can be obtained through the other endpoints.

api_list.name: Get Product
